metadata.title: CVE-2024-27072 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: usbtv: Remove useless locks in usbtv_video_free()Remove locks calls in usbtv_video_free() becauseare useless and may led to a deadlock as reported here:https://syzkaller.appspot.com/x/bisect.txt?x=166dc872180000Also remove usbtv_stop() call since it will be called whenunregistering the device.Before 'c838530d230b' this issue would only be noticed if youdisconnect while streaming and now it is noticeable even whendisconnecting while not streaming.[hverkuil: fix minor spelling mistake in log message]
